comprehensive.title: Zero False Positives
comprehensive.explanation: Watch how 'lan' finds ONLY networking tenders (VLAN, Ethernet, Layer 2 switches) and NOT irrelevant 'land development' or 'landscape' projects. Anti-pattern protection ensures precision.

comprehensive.title: Keyword Expansion Power
comprehensive.explanation: A simple 3-letter search 'api' automatically expands into 4 professional phrases: 'application programming interface', 'rest api', 'api gateway', 'openapi'. This finds 10x more relevant tenders than portal searches.

comprehensive.title: Domain Classification
comprehensive.explanation: TenderIntel automatically classifies 'waf' (Web Application Firewall) as SECURITY domain with 95% confidence. Domain-aware search improves result relevance and enables industry-specific filtering.

comprehensive.title: Government Procurement Terms (NEW)
comprehensive.explanation: NEW in v2.0: Government-specific terms like 'rfp' (Request for Proposal), 'gem' (Government e-Marketplace), 'aoc' (Award of Contract), 'cppp' now supported. Critical for procurement professionals.

comprehensive.title: Emerging Technologies (NEW)
comprehensive.explanation: NEW: Cutting-edge tech keywords like 'genai' (Generative AI), 'llm' (Large Language Models), 'quantum', 'blockchain' now supported. Stay ahead of technology trends in government procurement.

comprehensive.title: Advanced Filtering Precision
comprehensive.explanation: Combine keyword search with filters for laser-focused results: 'cloud' tenders in Northern India worth ‚Çπ1-5 Crore. From 18 results to 3 highly relevant opportunities.

comprehensive.title: Similarity Threshold Control
comprehensive.explanation: Control precision with similarity threshold: 70% = high-quality matches only. BM25 ranking ensures most relevant results appear first. Adjust threshold based on your needs.

quickStart.title: Quick Demo: Networking
quickStart.explanation: Find networking equipment tenders with intelligent expansion

interactiveScenarios.name: Networking: Local Area Network
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Demonstrates intelligent expansion of 'lan' into 5 networking phrases while avoiding false positives like 'land development'. Perfect example of anti-pattern protection.
interactiveScenarios.educationalValue: Shows how 3-letter acronyms transform into precise multi-word searches

interactiveScenarios.name: Networking: VPN Solutions
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Expands 'vpn' to 'virtual private network', 'site to site vpn', 'vpn gateway', 'ipsec'. Finds secure connectivity tenders.

interactiveScenarios.name: Cloud: API Services
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Expands 'api' to professional terms while avoiding 'application form' false positives. Cloud domain with 95% confidence.

interactiveScenarios.name: Cloud: AWS Services (NEW)
interactiveScenarios.explanation: NEW in v2.0: Cloud provider keywords like 'aws', 'azure', 'gcp' now supported for vendor-specific searches.

interactiveScenarios.name: Security: Identity & Access Management
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Expands 'iam' to 'identity and access management', 'user management', 'access control'. Security domain classification.

interactiveScenarios.name: Security: Firewall Solutions
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Finds network firewall, NGFW, WAF tenders. Comprehensive security solution discovery.

interactiveScenarios.name: Security: Web Application Firewall
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Specialized security term: 'waf' ‚Üí 'web application firewall', 'application layer firewall', 'web protection'.

interactiveScenarios.name: Database: SQL Systems
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Expands 'sql' to relational database solutions. Finds MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle opportunities.

interactiveScenarios.name: Database: MongoDB NoSQL
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Vendor-specific database search: 'mongodb' ‚Üí document database, JSON database.

interactiveScenarios.name: AI/ML: Machine Learning Platform
interactiveScenarios.explanation: AI/ML term: 'ml' ‚Üí 'machine learning', 'model training platform', 'mlops platform'.

interactiveScenarios.name: AI: Generative AI (NEW)
interactiveScenarios.explanation: NEW: Generative AI support - 'genai' ‚Üí 'generative artificial intelligence', 'large language model', 'llm hosting'.

interactiveScenarios.name: Government: Request for Proposal (NEW)
interactiveScenarios.explanation: NEW: Government-specific term - 'rfp' ‚Üí 'request for proposal', 'tender document', 'procurement notice', 'bid invitation'.

interactiveScenarios.name: Government: GeM Portal (NEW)
interactiveScenarios.explanation: NEW: 'gem' ‚Üí 'government e marketplace', 'gem portal', 'government procurement portal'. India-specific procurement tracking.

interactiveScenarios.name: Government: Award of Contract (NEW)
interactiveScenarios.explanation: NEW: Track awarded contracts - 'aoc' ‚Üí 'award of contract', 'contract award', 'tender award'.

interactiveScenarios.name: Emerging: Blockchain Technology (NEW)
interactiveScenarios.explanation: NEW: Future tech - 'blockchain' ‚Üí 'distributed ledger', 'blockchain technology', 'decentralized database'.

interactiveScenarios.name: Emerging: Internet of Things
interactiveScenarios.explanation: 'iot' ‚Üí 'internet of things', 'connected devices', 'smart devices'. Track IoT procurement opportunities.

interactiveScenarios.name: Advanced: Filter Combination
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Combine filters for precision: Cloud services in Northern India worth ‚Çπ1-5 Crore. From 18 results to 3 perfect matches.

interactiveScenarios.name: Advanced: Similarity Thresholds
interactiveScenarios.explanation: Control match quality with similarity threshold: 0% = all matches, 50% = moderate, 100% = exact. BM25 algorithm ranks by relevance.
